ITALIAN CATERING

Chafing Racks and Sternos can be purchased for $10 per set


ITALIAN


All entrees served with choice of pasta, sauce, and table bread.

  • Italian Sausage, Peppers
    & Onions

    Slow roasted Italian sausage, sweet bell peppers, onions and garden tomato red sauce.

    75 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Fettuccine w/ Classic Italian Meat Sauce

    Classic italian meat sauce simmered in our herbed garlic and tomato red sauce.

    65 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Grilled Fish in Lemon Caper Sauce

    Grilled organic USA tilapia in lemon caper sauce.

    75 (Serves 8 - 10)

CHICKEN ENTREES

  • House Marinated Chicken Breast

    Marinated chicken breast, cast iron seared and slow roasted.

    75 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Chicken Piccata

    House marinated and seasoned chicken breast with signature lemon caper sauce.

    80 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Chicken Parmesan

    Parmesan crusted chicken breast topped with fresh mozzarella and signature red sauce.

    80 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Chicken Marsala

    House marinated and seasoned chicken breast covered with mushrooms and simmered marsala reduction sauce.

    80 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Roasted Red Pepper Garlic Cream Chicken

    Marinated chicken breast sauced with a roasted red pepper garlic cream.

    80 (Serves 8 - 10)

MEATBALLS

  • Parmesan Sirloin Meatballs

    Hand-rolled sirloin with savory herb and parmesan flavor.

    70 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Sirloin & Italian Sausage Meatballs

    Hand-rolled sirloin and italian sausage with fresh herbs and spices.

    70 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Sirloin Herb Meatballs

    Hand-rolled sirloin meatballs with fresh herbs and spices.

    70 (Serves 8 - 10)

LASAGNA

  • Classic Lasagna

    Meat sauce, ricotta and whole milk mozzarella cheese, aged parmesan, with Italian pasta. Served by the pan.

    60 (Serves 6 - 8)

  • 3 Cheese Lasagna

    Our meatless version of our classic lasagna. Served by the pan.

    50 (Serves 6 - 8)

  • Eggplant Lasagna

    Layers of fresh eggplant, roasted peppers, added to our 3 cheese lasagna. Served by the pan.

    50 (Serves 6 - 8)

PASTAS

  • Penne

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Linguini

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Fettuccine

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Cavatappi

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Spaghetti (GF)

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

SAUCES

  • Garden Tomato

    Roasted garden vegetables, fresh herbs and Italian plum tomatoes.

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Vodka Cream

    Garden tomato sauce with reduced organic vodka and cream.

    20 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Lemon Caper

    Roasted garlic cream sauce with reduced fresh lemon, white wine and capers.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)

  • Roasted Garlic Cream

    Slow roasted garlic and shallots with wine and cream.

    25 (Serves 8 - 10)
